mapper.update: update event_inst set EVT_SERIAL_NUM = #{evtSerialNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVENT_ID = #{eventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, EVT_COLLECT_TIME = #{evtCollectTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EVT_CONTENT = #{evtContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where EVT_INST_ID = #{evtInstId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select EVT_INST_ID, EVT_SERIAL_NUM, EVENT_ID, EVT_COLLECT_TIME, EVT_CONTENT, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from event_inst where EVT_INST_ID = #{evtInstId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select EVT_INST_ID, EVT_SERIAL_NUM, EVENT_ID, EVT_COLLECT_TIME, EVT_CONTENT, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from event_inst
